Reviews.Title: “Worst back office and front desk service I have ever received in my life”

Reviews.Content: hotel value front desk office service absolutely worst change reservation night earlier run decided fight principle sake charge 100 dollar cancellation fee move reservation night cost 95 dollars expedia line hung 5 times phone hour half fax fax change request told fax broken finally able change hours nasty attitude unfriendliness staff reservation hotel chain unfortunate location am writing review ticked am try screw 100 bucks
